nodes.bodyText: I just noticed this dependency has a different GAV than in Wildfly. It doesn't even exist in this version. Please remove it completely as it's not used.

nodes.bodyText: This version is used for product. Community version is down in community profile. Later when EAP CD19 will be out and the versions will be the same, we can simplify this.

nodes.bodyText: I didn't find this GAV in Wildfly.
Remove the comment and get rid of Jackson properties from the community profile.

nodes.bodyText: Please keep old version 7.3.0.GA-redhat-00004 for now. Build with new one is broken in PNC. Sorry for confusion.
